contexts.context: ...is being assaulted until he shuts up and is <mark>quiet</mark>.
...the lessons are bad. But he will remain <mark>quiet</mark> if someone complains that the teacher is too pious...
...as he saw his frightened Rabbi and asked with <mark>quiet</mark> voice:
...us Galician Jewish people everything is still calm and <mark>quiet</mark>, like it is not missing for us. Here...
